description.fr: Tous les {ObjectMechanism:385,plural:other!} doivent être détruits. \--- Lorsqu'un Craqueleur meurt\_: Il se transforme en {ObjectMechanism:385}.
description.en: All the {ObjectMechanism:385,plural:other!} must be destroyed. \--- When a Crackler dies: Turns into a {ObjectMechanism:385}.
description.es: Todos los {ObjectMechanism:385,plural:other!} deben ser destruidos. \--- Cuando un crujidor muere: Se transforma en {ObjectMechanism:385}.
description.de: Alle {ObjectMechanism:385,plural:other!} müssen zerstört werden. \--- Wenn ein Krachler stirbt: Verwandelt sich in einen\_{ObjectMechanism:385}.
description.pt: Todos os {ObjectMechanism:385,plural:other!} devem ser destruídos. \--- Quando um Smagador morre: Ele se transforma em {ObjectMechanism:385}.

summary.fr: Tous les personnages adverses et  {ObjectMechanism:385,plural:other!} doivent être détruits.
summary.en: All the opposing characters and {ObjectMechanism:385,plural:other!} must be destroyed.
summary.es: Hay que destruir los personajes enemigos y {ObjectMechanism:385,plural:other!}.

summary.pt: Todos os personagens adversários e {ObjectMechanism:385,plural:other!} devem ser destruídos.
